maze.logic.GameObjects

Class Maze

  • java.lang.Object
    • maze.logic.GameObjects.Maze
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Maze
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Class that represents the maze in the game. It is responsible for checking line of sight between positions.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        public void generateRandomMaze(int h,
                               int w)
        Generates a random maze using the utility class 'MazeBuilder'
        Parameters:
        h - Height of the maze to generate
        w - Width of the maze to generate

      • checkLineOfSight

        public boolean checkLineOfSight(int xi,
                                int yi,
                                int xf,
                                int yf,
                                int direction)
        Checks line of sight between two points in the maze
        Parameters:
        xi - X value for the initial point
        yi - Y value for the initial point
        xf - X value for the final point
        yf - Y value for the final point
        direction - Which direction to check (0:Left, 1:Right, 2:UP, 3:Down)
        Returns:
        TRUE: If there is no walls between the two points | FALSE: If there is at least a wall between the two points

      • getH

        public int getH()
        Returns:
        Height of maze

      • getW

        public int getW()
        Returns:
        Width of maze

      • getMaze

        public int[][] getMaze()
        Returns:
        Current maze

      • getPosition

        public int getPosition(int x,
                       int y)
        Gets the maze block equivalent to the X and Y values specified
        Parameters:
        x - X value of the position
        y - Y value of the position
        Returns:
        0 if Floor, 1 if Wall and 2 if Exit
